div.p: Ι greet Valerius … and my sister Sophia and my sister Aphrodite and my mother and N.N. greets her, that is the … greet Phanias … I greet many times … I greet … and thereafter(?) …

N.N. in the Lord greets … to my father Paul in … Before all I want you to prosper well in the Lord. I want you to know that I fell ill. Therefore I am grateful to God … Father, drop forthwith [the price?] of the fifteen … breads. Don’t be neglectful and of my brother … Translation with modification: K.A. Worp, BASP 53 (2016) 67
